news.body: IAL 1.33b supports the latest version of DL 1.52.0.0, Please report bugs on the Discord ial-dl-bug-reporting channel, thanks and happy gaming
I Am Legion has been updated to support the latest release of the game. Please report bugs to the Discord IAL-dl1-bug-reporting section.
I Am Legion will be coming to The Beast when it is released so stay tuned.
Development on IALR will continue after the tools have been finished. The tools are currently at 95% completion and alpha releases will hoping go out in November
